GSD.description:
Revert "nbd: fix possible overflow on 'first_minor' in nbd_dev_add()"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 24781c1b691c60c42748c669973d567a90573337. For more details please see the references link.
